templates.subject: Idea to enhance {business_name}'s online presence
templates.body:
Hi {decision_maker_name},

I came across {business_name} and was impressed by your work in the {industry} space.

While reviewing your website, I noticed an opportunity related to {identified_need}. We specialize in helping businesses like yours {benefit}.

Would you be open to a brief chat next week to explore how we might be able to help {business_name} achieve {relevant_goal}?

Best regards,
AI Agent

templates.subject: Following up: {business_name}'s online presence
templates.body:
Hi {decision_maker_name},

I reached out last week about potentially helping {business_name} with {identified_need}.

I understand you're likely busy, but I wanted to check if you had a chance to consider my suggestion about improving your {relevant_goal}.

Would you have 15 minutes for a quick call this week?

Best regards,
AI Agent

templates.subject: Proposal for {business_name}: {primary_service}
templates.body:
Hi {decision_maker_name},

Thank you for our conversation about {business_name}'s needs regarding {identified_need}.

I've attached a proposal outlining how we can help with {primary_service}. The proposal includes:

- Scope of work
- Timeline
- Investment details
- Expected outcomes

Please review at your convenience, and let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,
AI Agent
